extendedInfo.description: The brand new Profanisaurus Das Krapital App is the ultimate swearing dictionary. Cross-linked entries enable you to finally make sense of what a sleeping fruit bat is and why you'd never want to mention knuckle glitter in polite company. Browse profanities by topics ranging from verbal to the loo, alphabetically or at random, and make your own list of favoured words so that you can find the perfect term to define those difficult situations when you're on the train home next to a Pocket Fisherman. AND NOW, VERSION 1.1 IS LIVE - Featuring new artwork, a widget and many performance increases and bug fixesEnliven your dull Email, Twitterings and Facebook life with the full folly and crudity of Roger's largest Profanisaurus yet. Even better, it's completely uncensored enabling you to enjoy Viz just as Roger intended.

reviews.title: Excellent content obviously but great features as well
reviews.comment: We all know its great yeah yeah. But the ability to favourite, the cloud feature, ability to share in whatsapp, interval update selection etc... are all genuinely excellent features and above the call of duty as it were. App developers - look and learn
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ha ha. Real Boy App
reviews.comment: Love it. Got the full size book and the app is great fun. Found searching for my favourites easy. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: Like others I have the book so having the app is a great companion. Would be nice if terms mentioned in definitions were linkable.
reviews.author: Neil Munday

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Got the hardback book which is a fantastic read when you\'re laying a cable... Love the fact I can look up stuff while on the move.... Not laying cables....
reviews.author: Matt Bricknell

reviews.title: Outrageous
reviews.comment: I\'m sickened and disgusted by the price charged for this app. Surely just like it\'s magazine counterpart the price should be put up? Sort it out Dennis Publishing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A wizard\'s sleeve full
reviews.comment: Great app, but would be improved if the words in the definition were linkable

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.comment: Hilarious! Gets updated with new swearing. Can\'t ask for much more!

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I have nothing further to add.  It would be nice if definitions that feature other words were hyperlinked.

reviews.title: Viz rocks
reviews.comment: Truly epic laughs, this is for anyone with a cheeky sense. of humour. Money well spent :-)

reviews.title: Really Good.
reviews.comment: Your girlfriend will love you even more if you expand your vocabulary with this app.

reviews.title: Brilliant, a little room for improvement
reviews.comment: It\'s a brilliant app, the only real bonus would be if references were hyperlinked

reviews.comment: This is far better value then most of the other crap on here well worth \302\2431.49

reviews.comment: Makes laying a guinness rope at work an absolute pleasure resulting in near permanent bombay birthmarks :-D

reviews.title: Superb reference book

reviews.title: Needs to match iPhone

reviews.title: F***king brill
reviews.comment: Works a treat on my galaxy nexus,gives me something else to read, apart from BBC news updates, while dropping the kids off at the pool. The cloud is a particularly nice touch.

reviews.title: No licence after buying app???
reviews.comment: Not impressed as paid for app and it won\'t open as it says there is no licence for this product. Avoid
